Hi Friends,

I am new to the JUnit group and also in the using of JUnit framework. We are
migrating our projects into Java and so need some good test cases to be made
for the automated testing.

Can anyone tell whether there is any method provided in JUnit to log the
test results so that one can have look on them later on.

Regards
Vipul
